scripts.buildLib: echo 'import * as tmp from "date-fns"; window.dateFns = tmp;' | npx esbuild --bundle --minify --charset=utf8 --outfile=date-fns.js
scripts.buildLocales: echo 'import * as tmp from "date-fns/locale"; window.dateFnsLocales = tmp;' | esbuild --bundle --minify --charset=utf8 --outfile=date-fns-locales.js
